goclient.gui

Class BoardPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • goclient.gui.BoardPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class BoardPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Panel representing game board. Handles drawing board and stones on screen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • pullToGrid

        public java.awt.Point pullToGrid(java.awt.Point p)
        Calculates point on grid which is closest to given one. If given point is further than precision allows, returns null.
        Parameters:
        Point - to pull to grid
        Returns:
        Point on grid closest to given point or null if given point doesn't match any.
